__e: Kind of like the way I felt when I walked in here today.
I'm sorry about having to come in here. But I have to talk to you.
I should have said something when I walked in,
I don't know how you got in here, little girl, but it was a big mistake.
What have I told you since the first day you stepped into my office?
There's no way out except the way we came in!
You walked in with that. You didn't even give him a chance.
Don't worry, eh? I'm at the bank, some people burst in... and we're not allowed out yet.
And then you came through that door... and I looked at you, and... well... you're just like any other person.
I was gonna wait till I found Michael and just kill you in front of him, but instead, I'm gonna take you out the same way you came in-- alone.
Either way, you must've thought it was gonna be the end, coming in on your lonesome like that.
So how come last night was the first night you didn't ask if anyone had called when you walked in the door?
The girl... the girl that just came in here. I need to speak to her.
